content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello, Yi-Nuo. I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. It's a fantastic property in the heart of the city. How much are you willing to pay for such a prime location?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mister Schmidt, I'm a student, and I'm looking for a place that's not only comfortable but also affordable. I'm smart with my money, and I'm not easily convinced. I'm willing to pay a fair price for the apartment, but I'd like to negotiate the best deal possible. How much are you thinking of asking for this unfurnished one-bedroom unit?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As you are a student, I understand that you may have a budget to consider. However, the location of this apartment is unparalleled, and I have to ensure that the rent reflects the value of the property. I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the convenience and the status that comes with living in the city center. How much do you think is a fair price for this 50-square-meter gem?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the quality of the apartment, Mister Schmidt. As a student, I'm looking for a place that's not only comfortable but also fits within my budget. I'm willing to pay a fair price for the location and the amenities. Could you provide me with your initial asking price so that we can discuss from there?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Certainly, Yi-Nuo. I believe that a fair price for this exceptional apartment in the heart of München is €850 per month. This includes all the benefits of city living, including proximity to public transportation and essential amenities. What do you think about this offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the location is prime, and the price reflects that, Mister Schmidt. I'm going to need some time to consider your offer and to make sure it aligns with my budget. Can we discuss this further after I've had a chance to think it over?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Certainly, take your time. I'm confident that once you've considered the value of this apartment and its prime location, you'll see that my asking price is more than fair. Let me know when you're ready to discuss further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I will get back to you soon with my decision.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: No problem, Yi-Nuo. I look forward to your response. If you have any other questions or need more time, feel free to contact me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I've given your offer some thought, Mister Schmidt, and while I appreciate the quality of the apartment, I feel that the price is slightly higher than what I'm willing to pay. I'm going to have to decline your offer. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is not within my budget.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Yi-Nuo. If you change your mind or are open to discussing a different price, please let me know. Good luck with your search for an apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
